titleStmt.title: The restauration [sic]. Or, A poem on the return of the most mighty and ever glorious Prince, Charles the II. to his kingdoms. By Arthur Brett of Christs-Church Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Brett, Arthur, d. 1677?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.H. for Samuel Thomson at the Bishops-head in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
